abstract: Facebook now will give advertisers the ability to create their own profile pages on its system that will let users identify themselves as fans of a product.
snippet: Facebook now will give advertisers the ability to create their own profile pages on its system that will let users identify themselves as fans of a product.
lead_paragraph: Facebook wants to turn every member into a spokesman for its advertisers. Mark Zuckerberg, the founder and chief executive of the superhot social network, today announced what the company calls “social ads.”

headline.main: Facebook to Turn Users Into Endorsers
